  • fastemplate.services.v1.person

Source code for fastemplate.services.v1.person

from fastapi import APIRouter

from fastemplate import logger
from fastemplate.objects.person import Person
from fastemplate.module.person import body_mass_index


router = APIRouter()



[docs]@router.post('/bmi')
def bmi(person: Person):
    """
    Calculates a person BMI.

    :param person: Person
    :return: dict
    """
    logger.info(f'Request @ /bmi')
    return {
        'message': f'Hello {person.name}! Thank you for using this tool.',
        'bmi': float('{:.2f}'.format(body_mass_index(h=person.height, w=person.weight)))
    }
